description:
Create a modern dark-themed chat application interface similar to ChatGPT with the following features:

1. LEFT SIDEBAR:
- Logo at top with 'NeuralChat' branding and 'Graph Memory Active' subtitle
- 'New Chat' button with gradient emerald/cyan styling
- List of recent chat sessions with titles, preview text, and timestamps
- Collapsible on mobile

2. MAIN CHAT AREA:
- Dark background (#0a0a0f)
- Messages displayed with user messages on right (dark bg) and AI messages on left (with emerald accent)
- AI messages should show 'Graph Memory' source badge
- Smooth scroll to bottom on new messages
- Typing animation for AI responses

3. INPUT AREA at bottom:
- Auto-expanding textarea
- Send button with gradient that activates when text is entered
- Placeholder text 'Ask anything...'
- Disclaimer text about AI accuracy

4. FUNCTIONALITY:
- Connect to /api/chat/send endpoint for real AI responses
- Pass userId (generate random ID and store in localStorage)
- Display suggested topics returned from API as clickable chips
- Show related context when available
- Save conversation history locally

5. STYLING:
- Use emerald/cyan gradient accents
- Smooth animations for message appearance
- Custom scrollbar styling
- Responsive design for mobile

Add a new '/graph' page that visualizes the knowledge graph with the following features:

1. HEADER:
- Title 'Knowledge Graph Explorer'
- Back to Chat button
- Stats showing: Total Topics, Total Connections, Total Insights

2. GRAPH VISUALIZATION:
- Use a force-directed graph layout (can use D3.js or simple CSS/SVG)
- Show topics as circular nodes with their names
- Show connections as lines between nodes
- Line thickness based on connection strength
- Nodes should be draggable
- Color-code nodes by cluster (physics=blue, medical=green, computing=purple, etc.)

3. SIDEBAR/PANEL:
- List of all topics with connection counts
- Click a topic to highlight its connections
- Show recent insights related to selected topic

4. DATA:
- Fetch from /api/graph/global endpoint
- Show loading state while fetching
- Handle empty state gracefully

5. STYLING:
- Match the dark theme of the chat page
- Use emerald/cyan accents
- Smooth animations for node interactions
- Responsive layout
